typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_cliente as integer,
		nome as string,
		idade as integer,
		data_nascimento as date,
		tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		id_cliente as integer,
		nome as string,
		idade as integer,
		data_nascimento as date,
		tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2))~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_q_teste_final'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dim_q_teste.txt'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
